name: Once Upon a Pond
description:
Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Move Mouse to Look Around

Run into Characters to Start a Conversation

Space to Continue Dialog

Once Upon a Pond is a bite sized, light-hearted, stylized adventure game made in 5 days for the Brackeys 2023.1 Game Jam. Enjoy fun characters in this interactive 3D experience.  Play time is about 3-10 minuets and gameplay stays pretty simple. This game shines through its cute, stylized art style and relaxing gameplay. Enjoy!

All assets were created by me (Coding Kricket).
